info.title: Condition Record for Pricing in Purchasing
info.description: Consumers of this inbound service can create, read, update, and delete condition records inside your system by using OData requests. The service contains entities for condition record, validity of condition record, pricing scale, and condition supplement.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete condition records for pricing in Purchasing using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads validity of all condition records in the system.
get.description: Reads validity of all condition records for pricing in Purchasing. Validity includes fields such as valid from and to dates, condition fields, and condition type.

get.summary: Reads the validity of a specific condition record.
get.description: Reads the validity of a specific condition record, which the consumer specifies by passing condition record number, valid-from date, and valid-to date. Validity includes fields such as valid from and to dates, condition fields, and condition type.

post.summary: Creates one or more pricing scales.
post.description: Creates one or more pricing scales for existing condition records or condition supplements, which the consumer specifies by passing condition record number and sequential number in the payload.

parameters.description: Current number of the line scale

post.summary: Creates one or more condition records.
post.description: Creates one or more condition records by using deep insert requests. This means that consumers must create a condition record together with validity of the condition record. Consumers do this by including the entity for condition record validity in the payload.

parameters.name: ConditionRecord
parameters.description: Number of Condition Record

get.description: Reads a specific condition record for pricing in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing the condition record number.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates a specific condition record for pricing in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing the condition record number.

delete.description: Deletes a specific condition record, which the consumer specifies by passing the condition record number. When a condition record is deleted, its validity, pricing scales, and condition supplements are no longer valid in pricing.

parameters.description: Number of Condition Record

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
